hotels.title: Bali Central Highlands Hilltop Rainforest Retreat with Lagoon Pool
hotels.description: Hidden away in the tranquil tropical paradise of Baliâ€™s central highlands, Homm Saranam Baturiti cultivates calming spaces for rejuvenation and invigorating moments of joy. Bask in uninterrupted views of thriving rainforest and soaring mountainscapes while relaxing on spacious private balconies and wading in the pristine lagoon-style pool. Reach a new level of tranquillity with a luxurious treatment at 8LEMENTS Spa, a yoga class or indulge in delectable international and Indonesian fare at Samiya.
